scripts.build: echo 'Building documentation...' && node scrape.js && echo 'Documentation built successfully!'
scripts.status:
echo 'Generated files:' && (test -d docs && ls -la docs/ || echo 'No docs directory') && echo '
Total files:' && (test -d docs && ls docs/*.md 2>/dev/null | wc -l || echo '0')
scripts.validate: echo 'Validating URLs in db.json...' && node -e "console.log(JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync('db.json', 'utf8')).map((url, i) => \`\${i+1}. \${url}\`).join('\\n'))"
